wiki.text:
'Riding' is a homonym of two distinct English words:

From the word 'ride':
* Equestrianism, riding a horse
* Riding animal, an animal bred or trained for riding
* Ridin', a song by Chamillionaire From Old English '*þriðing':
* Riding (country subdivision), an administrative division of a county, or
  similar district
* Electoral district (Canada), a Canadian term for an electoral district
* Riding association, Canadian political party organization at the riding level
* Riding officer, a name once used for customs officials who patrolled for
  smugglers on beaches and other informal landing spots
* Common Riding, an event celebrated in some Scottish towns to commemorate the
  guarding the boundaries of the town's common land by local men

It may also refer to: *Douglas Riding, Australian air marshal *Joanna Riding,
English actress
wiki.title: riding
